document.full_text: daw aung san suu kyi appeared on a video link from yangon to tell an audience in hong kong that she would seek to broaden her audience in her country since being released from house arrest.
document.title: asia: dissident plans a more active role in myanmar
lines_and_colors: daw aung san suu kyi appeared on a video link from yangon to tell an audience in hong kong that she would seek to broaden her audience in her country since being released from house arrest.
